en.today: Uranus enters Gemini this morning, dear Aries, offering sneak peeks into what the next seven years might look like. Please pay attention to any radical thoughts or conversations that emerge, considering how they might play out down the line. Meanwhile, Venus and Pluto form a sweet connection, helping you evolve socially. Invest in connections you're hoping to grow, and give yourself space from anyone who has a penchant for negativity. The divine will speak through you when creative expression is embraced while the Sagittarius moon and Mercury align midafternoon. However, disorganization could make it difficult to successfully convey your message when Mars becomes agitated, so be mindful to pace yourself.

en.today: You'll crave excitement within your social sphere, dear Leo, as Uranus moves into chatty Gemini and your solar eleventh house. Fresh faces will emerge in the coming months, and your social sphere will look quite different seven years from now. Your attitude toward love shifts while Venus and Pluto align, making it easier to connect with people who genuinely adore and respect you. Put your boldest and wittiest self on full display midafternoon when the Sagittarius moon and Mercury align. Just be mindful of what you say and how you present yourself while Mars becomes agitated, which could cause time to speed up.

en.today: Uranus exits your sign and debuts into Gemini, dearest bull, reshaping your foundations and relationship to money. A helpful alliance between Venus and Pluto helps you evolve toward prosperity and success, but you'll need to shed layers that have prevented you from meeting your full potential. Get serious about what you hope to manifest and what it will take to make these dreams a reality. Heightened emotional intelligence will make it easy to strengthen important bonds while the Sagittarius moon and Mercury align midafternoon. However, serious conversations could also lead to triggers and bruised egos while Mars becomes agitated, especially when egos flare.

en.today: Uranus moves into your sign this morning, dear Gemini, bringing electricity to your aura. You'll crave recognition, freedom, and excitement, but you should travel these paths with some level of caution. Luckily, the stars are on your side when it comes to luck and growth, thanks to a sweet connection between Venus and Pluto. Now is a great time to connect with your ancestors, asking for help along your journey toward self-actualization. Bursts of joy put you in the mood for connection while the Sagittarius moon and Mercury align midafternoon, and romantic moments could emerge. Just try not to let passions blind you while Mars becomes agitated.

kh.today: អ៊ុយរ៉ានុសឈានទៅរកសញ្ញាសំគាល់របស់អ្នកនៅព្រឹកនេះ Gemini ជាទីស្រឡាញ់នាំាលអគ្គិសនីដល់ Aura របស់អ្នក។អ្នកនឹងមានសេរីភាពទទួលការទទួលស្គាល់សេរីភាពនិងការរំភើបប៉ុន្តែអ្នកគួរតែធ្វើដំណើរតាមផ្លូវទាំងនេះដោយមានការប្រុងប្រយ័ត្នខ្លះ។ជាសំណាងល្អផ្កាយនៅខាងអ្នកនៅពេលដែលវាមករកសំណាងល្អនិងការរីកចម្រើនដោយសារការតភ្ជាប់ផ្អែមរវាងភេនសនិងផ្លាតូ។ឥឡូវនេះគឺជាពេលវេលាដ៏ល្អដើម្បីភ្ជាប់ទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយបុព្វបុរសរបស់អ្នកដោយស្នើសុំជំនួយក្នុងការធ្វើដំណើររបស់អ្នកឆ្ពោះទៅរកការធ្វើឱ្យខ្លួនឯងបានធ្វើឱ្យខ្លួនឯងបានធ្វើឱ្យខ្លួនឯងបានធ្វើឱ្យកើតឡើង។ការផ្ទុះសេចក្តីអំណរបានធ្វើឱ្យអ្នកមានអារម្មណ៍ថាមានអារម្មណ៍ថាត្រូវបានតភ្ជាប់ខណៈពេលដែល Sagittarius Moon និងបារតតម្រឹមតម្រឹមតាមពាក់កណ្តាលព្រះសង្ឃនិងឱកាសរ៉ូមែនទិកអាចលេចចេញមក។គ្រាន់តែព្យាយាមមិនឱ្យតណ្ហាធ្វើឱ្យអ្នកពិការភ្នែកខណៈដែលភពព្រះអង្គារមានអារម្មណ៍ធុញថប់។
